name: dramaturgo
description: - A good IDE: [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/)     - Optional: [Playwright Test for VSCode extension](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-playwright.playwright) - Optional: A good terminal: Windows Terminal (get it from the Microsoft Store) - [Git](https://git-scm.com/download/win) for version control:        - Optional: [posh-git](https://github.com/dahlbyk/posh-git) to get inline Git status summary info.     - Create an account on [Github](https://github.com/) - [Node](https://nodejs.org/en/download) as the runtime for Javascript
